t:
Before I go to bed, I make sure that the front door is locked.




Then I go around my house locking all the windows,
      then switching off all the lights,
           and then closing the front door,
                 before going to sleep.
c:
I've to say, I've closed more doors than I've opened.



I'm gonna #sleepnow. You can collab.  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#night #security #intruder #door #lock #ignorance





Front door. It's closed twice.
